text: == Events == * January 14 – Henry III of England marries Eleanor of Provence. * May 6 – Roger of Wendover, Benedictine monk and chronicler of St Albans Abbey dies. His chronicle is continued by Matthew Paris. * September 22 – Lithuanians and Semigallians beat Livonian Brothers of the Sword in Battle of Siauliai * Volga Bulgaria is conquered by Mongol khan Batu. * Córdoba was retaken for Christianity as part of the Reconquista in 1236, and became a centre of activity against the remaining Islamic population. * Accession of Razia al-Din to the Sultanate of Delhi. == Deaths == * Khwaja Moinuddin Chisti,a Sufi Saint. * Iltutmish
